#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int max(int a, int b, int c) { return a>b?(a>c?a:c):(b>c?b:c); }
int min(int a, int b, int c) { return a<b?(a<c?a:c):(b<c?b:c); }

int main()
{
	char s[100005];
	int i, t, r, g, b, count, ans;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&s);
		r=g=b=0, ans=100005;
		for(i=0; s[i]!='\0'; i++)
		{ 
			if(s[i]=='R') r=i+1;
			else if(s[i]=='G') g=i+1;
			else b=i+1;
			if(r && b && g && (count=max(r,g,b)-min(r,g,b)+1)<ans) ans=count;
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
